# Introduction {#intro}

Welcome to BIOL-350 (Spring 2024) at New York Tech!&nbsp; For this set of lectures, follow along with the slides [here](https://wletsou.github.io/BIOL-350/master/docs/Biol%20350%20slides.pdf).&nbsp; Each chapter describes the theory and practice of the step in an analysis pipeline for you to conduct your own genetic association study.
